programme.desc: Leeds Rhinos v St Helens (Kick-off 8.00pm). Coverage of the top-flight encounter, which takes place at Headingley, as two of the biggest names in the sport go head to head. The Rhinos have shown signs of improvement in recent weeks and have begun to rise up the table, as they continue to chase Castleford Tigers at the top of the standings. Meanwhile, Saints are having an inconsistent campaign, and will be wary of falling further down the league and dropping out of contention for the Super 8s.(n)
